title: The NeverEnding Story II: The Next Chapter
plot: A young boy with a distant father enters a world of make-believe and magic through a portal within an antique book.

title: The Untamed
plot: Two talented disciples of respectable magical clans unit during the cultivation training and through many hardships they are together.

title: Cold Courage
plot: Two young Finnish women in London are drawn inexorably together via the Studio - a clandestine group dedicated to bringing justice to those beyond the law.

title: Between Two Ferns: The Movie
plot: Zach Galifianakis and his oddball crew take a road trip to complete a series of high-profile celebrity interviews.

title: Wine Country
plot: During a vacation to Napa Valley, a group of long time friends reunite and revisit past choices in this hilarious and heartfelt comedy from director Amy Poehler.

title: Victory
plot: As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.

title: Chasing Amy
plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

title: War Machine
plot: An idiosyncratic general confronts opposition from enemies, allies, and bureaucrats while leading a massive rebuilding operation in Afghanistan.

title: Black Dynamite
plot: Black Dynamite is the greatest African-American action star of the 1970s. When his only brother is killed by The Man, it's up to him to find justice.

title: The Occupant
plot: Javier Muñoz, once a successful executive, makes the fateful decision to leave his home, which he and his family can no longer afford.

title: That Awkward Moment
plot: Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"

title: Flipped
plot: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

title: Vagabond
plot: An ordinary man who comes across surprising circumstances that place him in the center of a huge corruption scandal.

title: He Got Game
plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

title: Les Misérables in Concert: The 25th Anniversary
plot: A celebratory 25th anniversary concert performance of the hit musical at The O2 in London.

title: Sin Senos No Hay Paraíso
plot: Sin Senos No Hay Paraiso tells the tragic story of a young woman named Catalina Santana who's ambition is so strong she'll risk her life, because of her obsession with having larger breasts...                 See full summary  »

title: Killer Elite
plot: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.

title: The Negotiator
plot: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: I'm Dying Up Here
plot: The series is based on William Knoedelseder's book of the same name.

title: Mr. Jones
plot: A Welsh journalist breaks the news in the western media of the famine in Ukraine in the early 1930s.

title: Lark Rise to Candleford
plot: An adaptation of Flora Thompson's autobiographical novel "Lark Rise To Candleford", set in 19 century Oxfordshire, in which a young girl moves to the local market town to begin an apprenticeship as a postmistress.

title: The Final Girls
plot: A young woman grieving the loss of her mother, a famous scream queen from the 1980s, finds herself pulled into the world of her mom's most famous movie. Reunited, the women must fight off the film's maniacal killer.

title: Frances Ha
plot: A New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment) apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer) and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as the possibility of realizing them dwindles.

title: The Island of Dr. Moreau
plot: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

title: Blonde
plot: A fictionalized chronicle of the inner life of Marilyn Monroe.

title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
plot: Lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri look to solve their respective cash-flow problems by making an adult film together. As the cameras roll, however, the duo begin to sense that they may have more feelings for each other than they previously thought.

title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
plot: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

title: Olive Kitteridge
plot: A middle-school math teacher Olive and her marriage with Henry which spans 25 years.

title: Fiddler on the Roof
plot: In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

title: Innerspace
plot: A test pilot is miniaturized in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
plot: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in  John Wilkes Booth 's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of  Abraham Lincoln .

title: Exotica
plot: A man plagued by neuroses frequents the club Exotica in an attempt to find solace, but even there his past is never far away.

title: The Canyonlands
plot: After 5 people win a rafting trip down the Colorado in Utah, their adventure takes a deadly turn when they camp off the river for the night, and find out they aren't the only ones out in the remote rugged canyon lands.

title: Limitless
plot: An average twenty-eight-year-old man who gains the ability to use the full extent of his brain's capabilities is hired by the F.B.I. as a consultant.

title: The Postman
plot: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

title: Much Ado About Nothing
plot: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

title: The Nanny Diaries
plot: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

title: On the Waterfront
plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: Save Yourselves!
plot: A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

title: Saw II
plot: A detective and his team must rescue 8 people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw.

title: Single Parents
plot: A group of single parents form their own support system as they raise their kids and struggle to start new relationships.

title: For The People
plot: Set in the Southern District of New York Federal Court, brand new lawyers work for both the defense and the prosecution as they handle the most high profile and high stakes cases in the country - all as their personal lives intersect.

title: Ironheart
plot: The genius teenage-girl inventor Riri Williams creates the most advanced suit of armor since Iron Man.

title: True Grit
plot: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

title: Jackass 4
plot: After ten years, the Jackass crew is back for their final crusade.

title: Night Gallery
plot: Rod Serling  presents tales of horror illustrated in various paintings.

title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
plot: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

plot: Kimberly has a premonition of an accident killing multiple people including her and her friends. She blocks the cars behind her on the ramp and as a police trooper arrives, the accident happens. Death is stalking this group of survivors.

title: Mercury Rising
plot: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

title: Lying and Stealing
plot: Ivan steals art for the Greek. He wants out but can he? He meets an actress at 2 of his "jobs". She has her own problems but helps him.

title: Match Game
plot: The five-day-a-week syndicated successor to the popular CBS game show, where two could compete to match fill-in-the-blank phrases with those of the celebrities.

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
plot: A young peasant maid working in the house of painter Johannes Vermeer becomes his talented assistant and the model for one of his most famous works.

title: REC
plot: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

title: The Turning
plot: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past. A modern take on Henry James' novella "The Turn of the Screw."

title: Fame
plot: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

title: Black and White Love
plot: A doctor who has devoted herself to healing others encounters a cold-blooded killer with a wounded past. What happens when the woman who saves lives is captured by the man who takes them?

title: Less Than Zero
plot: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

title: Vikings: The Viking Sagas
plot: Add a Plot

plot: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

title: St. Vincent
plot: A young boy whose parents have just divorced finds an unlikely friend and mentor in the misanthropic, bawdy, hedonistic war veteran who lives next door.

plot: What happens when a man who believes he has retired from MI6 is called back to do one more job to regain his life, only to discover that this job may mean he has no life to go back to.

title: Drumline
plot: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

title: Replicas
plot: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.

title: Rounders
plot: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

plot: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

plot: Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.

plot: Judge Roy Bean, a self-appointed hanging judge in Vinegarroon, Texas, befriends saddle tramp Cole Harden, who opposes Bean's policy against homesteaders.

title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
plot: The seemingly normal life of Sakuta Azusagawa, a high school student changes drastically when he meets a wild bunny girl that seems to be invisible to others.

plot: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

plot: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

plot: Shattered by the unexpected news of their irreversible break-up, an aspiring orchestra conductor is puzzled by his girlfriend's mysterious and seemingly inexplicable case of disappearance. But, can he look beyond the facts?

plot: A New York music executive in the 1970s hustles to make a career out of the city's diverse music scene.

plot: Uje, a pop star in the 90's, gets diagnosed with Parkinsons. This is a film about his every day struggles.

title: Dancer in the Dark
plot: An East European girl travels to the United States with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: Little Birds
plot: TV adaptation of Anais Nin's infamous collection of erotic short stories.

title: Nurse Jackie
plot: A drug-addicted nurse struggles to find a balance between the demands of her frenetic job at a New York City hospital and an array of personal dramas.

plot: Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

title: Red Shoes and the Seven Dwarfs
plot: Princes who have been turned into Dwarfs seek the red shoes of a lady in order to break the spell, although it will not be easy. A parody with a twist.

plot: A look at the life of painter  Vincent van Gogh  during the time he lived in Arles and Auvers-sur-Oise, France.

title: Peter Rabbit
plot: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

title: The Boss Baby
plot: A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby pairs up with his 7-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.

title: Love Story
plot: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

title: Pete's Dragon
plot: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliott, who happens to be a dragon.

title: Castle in the Sky
plot: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

title: Swimming Pool
plot: A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.

title: Lockout
plot: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the president's daughter from an outer space prison taken over by violent inmates.

title: Oculus
plot: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

title: DOA: Dead or Alive
plot: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, an invitational martial arts contest. There, four female rival fighters will have to work together to uncover the secret that the organizer of the tournament is trying to hide.

title: Ophelia
plot: A re-imagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.

title: Wolf Hall
plot: After the downfall of Cardinal Wolsey, his secretary, Thomas Cromwell, finds himself amongst the treachery and intrigue of King Henry VIII's court and soon becomes a close advisor to the King, a role fraught with danger.

title: Before We Go
plot: Two strangers stuck in Manhattan for the night grow into each other's most trusted confidants when an evening of unexpected adventure forces them to confront their fears and take control of their lives.

title: The Promised Neverland
plot: A group of the smartest kids at a seemingly perfect orphanage uncover its dark secret, and set in motion a dangerous and desperate escape plan.

title: Varsity Blues
plot: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

title: The Intruder
plot: A young married couple buys a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.

title: Notes on a Scandal
plot: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.

title: The Very Excellent Mr. Dundee
plot: Paul Hogan is reluctantly thrust back into the spotlight as he desperately attempts to restore his sullied reputation on the eve of being knighted.

title: Hustle
plot: A motley group of London con artists pulls off a series of daring and intricate stings.

title: La Dolce Vita
plot: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

title: Hardcore Henry
plot: Henry is resurrected from death with no memory, and he must save his wife from a telekinetic warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.

title: Three Colors: Red
plot: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

title: Airwolf
plot: As part of a deal with an intelligence agency to look for his missing brother, a renegade pilot goes on missions with an advanced battle helicopter.

title: A Dangerous Method
plot: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

title: The Runaways
plot: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band  The Runaways . The relationship between band members  Cherie Currie  and  Joan Jett  is also explored.

title: The Sandhamn Murders
plot: Viveca Sten's popular novels come to life in "The Sandhamn Murders", a perfect mix of Nordic crime and the beautiful surroundings of the outer Stockholm archipelago.

title: Beaches
plot: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

title: The Bone Collector
plot: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

title: Playing with Fire
plot: A crew of rugged firefighters meet their match when attempting to rescue three rambunctious kids.

title: Everly
plot: An action/thriller centered on a kidnapped woman who faces down hitmen sent by a mob boss/her captor while trying to protect her family from his wrath.

title: Petticoat Junction
plot: The misadventures of the family staff of The Shady Rest Hotel and their neighbors of Hooterville.

title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
plot: A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

title: Cinderella
plot: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Coneheads
plot: Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

title: Insidious: Chapter 3
plot: A prequel set before the haunting of the Lambert family that reveals how gifted psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.

title: Kevin Can Wait
plot: A retired police officer is on a fresh career path as he rises to the challenge of being a newly single dad. His kids are grateful to him for making sure they're okay, but decide it's time for him to get out of the house, so they turn to Vanessa (Leah Remini), his former police partner, for help.

title: Taken 2
plot: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

title: Night of the Living Dead
plot: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

title: The Kid
plot: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

title: Claws
plot: A look at the life and crimes of five women who work at a Florida nail salon.

title: The Vietnam War
plot: A comprehensive history of the United States' involvement in the bitterly divisive armed conflict in Southeast Asia.

title: The Fairly OddParents
plot: After being tortured and humiliated by his babysitter, a ten year old boy is put under the care of two fairy godparents, who can grant him almost any wish, which leads to dire consequences.

plot: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the school children for criminal activities.

title: The Last Boy Scout
plot: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

title: Short Circuit
plot: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
plot: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

plot: An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975. His co-workers endure ridicule and contempt as they are wrongly accused of murder.

plot: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

plot: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

plot: The disappearance of people and corpses leads a reporter to a wax museum and a sinister sculptor.

title: On Deadly Ground
plot: A mystical martial artist/environmental Agent takes on a ruthless oil corporation.

plot: The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

plot: The story about the relationship between a rebellious 1950s teenager and his abusive stepfather, based on the memoirs of writer and literature Professor Tobias Wolff.

plot: On her wild quest for love, 9-year-old Benni's untamed energy drives everyone around her to despair.

title: Rosewood
plot: Miami pathologist Dr. Beaumont Rosewood, Jr. finds secrets in people's bodies using his state-of-the-art laboratory equipment.

title: Dial M for Murder
plot: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

plot: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

plot: A female celebrity has her whole life upended when her phone is hacked and a photo of her emerges in an extremely compromising position.

plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

plot: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood dream by going on a camping expedition for the lost D. B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

plot: A group of wealthy boys in Los Angeles during the early 1980s establish a 'get-rich-quick' scam that turns deadly.

plot: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

plot: Forced for some time to be a fighting slave, a pagan warrior escapes his captors with a boy and joins a group of Crusaders on their quest to the Holy Land.

plot: A modern-day Korean emperor passes through a mysterious portal and into a parallel world, where he encounters a feisty police detective.

plot: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality television show.

plot: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.

plot: After barely surviving prison, the demented Firefly clan go on the run, unleashing a whole new wave of murder, madness and mayhem.

plot: In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem.

plot: An adaptation of Alex Haley's "Roots", chronicling the history of an African man sold to slavery in America, and his descendants.

plot: The two top Agents of the United Network Command for Law and Enforcement (U.N.C.L.E.) fight the enemies of peace, particularly the forces of T.H.R.U.S.H.

plot: A comedy that follows a group of six students about to embark on the most exciting period of their lives so far, university.

title: Wonder Woman
plot: It's the modern day, and being Wonder Woman is complicated. Diana is leading a triple life - running a large corporation out of costume and fighting crime in costume in one identity.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
plot: Television adaptation of the romantic comedy film 'Four Weddings and a Funeral'.

plot: Follows Sam's adventures at a top-secret training program for a new class of second-born royals tasked with saving the world.

plot: A new arrival at a boarding school falls in love with a beguiling female student.

plot: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

title: Kung Fu Panda 2
plot: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

title: Deadly Promises
plot: At Castle Park High, both Dillon and Travis have a crush on Megan. Dillon would kill for her but not if a hidden secret in the basement kills them first.

title: R.I.P.D.
plot: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

title: Team America: World Police
plot: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.

title: Flight of the Navigator
plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

title: La Vie En Rose
plot: Biopic of the iconic French singer  Édith Piaf . Raised by her grandmother in a brothel, she was discovered while singing on a street corner at the age of 19. Despite her success, Piaf's life was filled with tragedy.

title: Tully
plot: A struggling mother of three forms an unexpected bond with the night nanny hired to help with her newborn baby.

title: The Emoji Movie
plot: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

title: Death on the Nile
plot: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

title: Beautiful Thing
plot: Jamie is a shy teenager, often bullied at school. His neighbour Ste has a rough time at home, being beaten by his father and brother. This issues bring them together and they find that what they feel for each other is more than friendship.

title: Vice Principals
plot: An over protective father is obsessed with becoming a principal and competes against the popular vice principal. However something happens that makes them work together to save the day.

title: Hunger
plot: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.

title: Masters of the Universe: Revelation
plot: Animated reboot of the classic Masters of the Universe franchise focusing on unresolved stories of the iconic characters, picking up where they left off decades ago.

title: Detective Conan
plot: The cases of a detective whose physical age was chemically reversed to that of a prepubescent boy but must hide his true mental development.

title: Death Race
plot: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

title: The Lair of the White Worm
plot: When an archaeologist uncovers a strange skull in foreign land, the residents of a near-by town begin to disappear, leading to further inexplicable occurrences.

title: Born on the Fourth of July
plot: The biography of  Ron Kovic . Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
plot: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

title: The Dirty Dozen
plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

title: American Mary
plot: The allure of easy money sends Mary Mason, a medical student, into the world of underground surgeries which ends up leaving more marks on her than her so called "freakish" clients.

title: 400 Bullets
plot: 400 BULLETS is an edge-of-your-seat Military Action story about what it means to fight for honor instead of profit. The film packs gun battles, epic hand-to-hand fight sequences and witty dialogue into its 90 minute run time.

title: The Thorn Birds
plot: In the arid 1920s Australian Outback, a Catholic priest and the beautiful granddaughter of a vast sheep station owner stand powerless before God's will, tormented by desire. How far are they willing to go in the name of love?

title: Squared Love
plot: A celebrity journalist and renowned womanizer starts to rethink his life choices after he falls for a mysterious model who leads a double life.

title: Centurion
plot: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is devastated in a guerrilla attack.

title: The Gloaming
plot: When an unidentified woman is found brutally murdered, Detective Molly McGee teams up with fellow cop, Alex O'Connell, with whom she shares a tragic past, to solve the crime.

title: Rudy
plot: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

title: Bridget Jones's Baby
plot: Forty-something and single again, Bridget decides to focus on her job and surround herself with friends. In a twist, she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

title: Crossroads
plot: A wanna be blues guitar virtuoso seeks a long lost song by legendary musician, Robert Johnson.

title: Insidious: Chapter 2
plot: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

title: V
plot: When aliens come to Earth to ask for our help, a few suspicious humans discover their horrific true intentions and prepare to resist.

title: Calibre
plot: A shocking deed turned their weekend trip into a nightmare. Now their only hope is to swallow their paranoia and act normal.

title: Spider-Man: The Animated Series
plot: A young man with spider-like abilities fights crime as a superhero in New York City while trying to have a normal personal life.

title: Troy: Fall of a City
plot: Retells the story of the 10 year siege of Troy, which occurred in the 12 or 13th century BC.

title: Mr. Brooks
plot: A well-respected businessman is sometimes controlled by his murder and mayhem-loving alter ego.

title: Before I Wake
plot: A couple adopt an orphaned child whose dreams - and nightmares - manifest physically as he sleeps.

title: Antrum: The Deadliest Film Ever Made
plot: A young boy and girl enter the forest to dig a hole to hell. Said to be a cursed film from the late 1970s, Antrum examines the horrifying power of storytelling.

title: 8MM
plot: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

title: The Blackout
plot: Life on Earth is rapidly destroyed except for a small area in Eastern Europe.

title: Failure to Launch
plot: A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.

title: The Missing
plot: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

title: The Way We Were
plot: Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

title: The New Legends of Monkey
plot: Entering the mythical world of the Monkey King, where a young monk and his group of disciples are on a journey to collect scrolls of Buddhist wisdom.

title: V/H/S
plot: When a group of misfits are hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.

title: Cagney & Lacey
plot: Two female police detectives cooperate with each other both in their professions and in their personal lives.

title: Holding the Man
plot: The warm, funny and achingly sad story of the 15-year-long love affair between Timothy Conigrave and the boy he fell in love with at high school, John Caleo.

title: Gunpowder Milkshake
plot: A secret sisterhood comes to the rescue of a mother-daughter assassin team.

title: Shrek Forever After
plot: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

title: My Birthday Romance
plot: A woman tired of her parents nagging her to find a boyfriend makes a deal with a guy who also doesn't want a relationship to pose as her boyfriend to keep her family off her back until after her birthday party.

title: Hotel Chevalier
plot: A prologue of one heart-breaking history of love and the prologue of the travel told in  The Darjeeling Limited  (2007).

title: Beethoven
plot: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

title: Octopussy
plot: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

title: Macbeth
plot: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

title: The Sandman
plot: Upon escaping after decades of imprisonment by a mortal wizard, Dream, the personification of dreams, sets about to reclaim his lost equipment.

title: Chicken Little
plot: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

title: Josie and the Pussycats
plot: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music.

title: Domino
plot: A recounting of  Domino Harvey 's life story. The daughter of actor  Laurence Harvey  turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

title: Psych 2: Lassie Come Home
plot: Shawn and Gus return to Santa Barbara, California to help their old police chief, but find themselves unwelcome in their old stomping ground as they secretly untangle a case that involves the supernatural.

title: Casino Royale
plot: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

title: Pale Rider
plot: A mysterious preacher ( Clint Eastwood ) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

title: Wasp Network
plot: The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder.

title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
plot: Now out of prison but still disgraced by his peers, Gordon Gekko works his future son-in-law, an idealistic stock broker, when he sees an opportunity to take down a Wall Street enemy and rebuild his empire.

title: Those Who Kill
plot: Follows Catherine Jensen, a recently promoted homicide detective who enlists the help of Thomas Schaeffer, a forensic psychologist, to track down serial killers and relentlessly seeks the ...                 See full summary  »

title: Danger Close
plot: In August 1966, in a Vietnamese rubber plantation called Long Tan, 108 young and inexperienced Australian and New Zealand soldiers are fighting for their lives against 2500 North Vietnamese and Viet Cong soldiers.

title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
plot: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.
